001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Arrays;
006import java.util.Collection;
007import java.util.HashMap;
008import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Locale;
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.Objects;
013import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
014import java.util.function.Function;
015import java.util.stream.Stream;
016
017import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNull;
018import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
019
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LevelResolver.LevelConfig;
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter;
022
023/**
024 * Resolves levels from logger names.
025 *
026 * @apiNote {@linkplain Level#ALL} is considered to be equivalent to null or unspecified.
027 */
028public interface LevelResolver {
029
030        /**
031         * Determines what level the logger should be at.
032         * @param name logger name.
033         * @return level.
034         */
035        public Level resolveLevel(String name);
036
037        /**
038         * Convenience method that checks if the loggers resolved level is less than the
039         * passed in level.
040         * @param loggerName logger name.
041         * @param level level.
042         * @return true if logger is less than passed in level.
043         */
044        default boolean isEnabled(String loggerName, Level level) {
045                return checkEnabled(level, resolveLevel(loggerName));
046        }
047
048        /**
049         * Clears any caching of levels.
050         */
051        default void clear() {
052
053        }
054
055        /**
056         * A special resolver that has direct mappings of logger name to level via
057         * {@link #levelOrNull(String)}.
058         */
059        @FunctionalInterface
060        interface LevelConfig extends LevelResolver {
061
062                /**
063                 * Returns a level exactly matching a logger name.
064                 * @param name logger name.
065                 * @return level or <code>null</code>.
066                 */
067                @Nullable
068                Level levelOrNull(String name);
069
070                /**
071                 * The default level if no level is found.
072                 * @return level
073                 */
074                default Level defaultLevel() {
075                        var root = levelOrNull("");
076                        if (root == null) {
077                                return Level.ALL;
078                        }
079                        return root;
080                }
081
082                @Override
083                default Level resolveLevel(String name) {
084                        return resolveLevel(this, name);
085                }
086
087                /**
088                 * Creates a level config from a list of level configs.
089                 * @param config configs.
090                 * @return coalesced config.
091                 */
092                public static LevelConfig of(Collection<? extends LevelConfig> config) {
093                        if (config.isEmpty()) {
094                                return StaticLevelResolver.OFF;
095                        }
096                        else if (config.size() == 1) {
097                                return Objects.requireNonNull(config.iterator().next());
098                        }
099                        return new CompositeLevelConfig(config.stream().flatMap(c -> {
100                                if (c instanceof CompositeLevelConfig cc) {
101                                        return Stream.of(cc.levelConfigs());
102                                }
103                                return Stream.of(c);
104                        }).distinct().toList().toArray(new LevelConfig[] {}));
105                }
106
107                private static Level resolveLevel(LevelConfig levelBindings, String name) {
108                        Function<String, @Nullable Level> f = s -> allToNull(levelBindings.levelOrNull(s));
109                        var level = LogProperties.findUpPathOrNull(name, f);
110                        if (level != null) {
111                                return level;
112                        }
113                        return levelBindings.defaultLevel();
114                }
115
116                private static @Nullable Level allToNull(@Nullable Level level) {
117                        if (level == null || level == Level.ALL) {
118                                return null;
119                        }
120                        return level;
121                }
122
123        }
124
125        /**
126         * Level resolver builder.
127         * @return builder.
128         */
129        public static Builder builder() {
130                return new Builder();
131        }
132
133        /**
134         * A level resolver that is off.
135         * @return level resolver that is {@link Level#OFF}.
136         */
137        public static LevelResolver off() {
138                return StaticLevelResolver.OFF;
139        }
140
141        /**
142         * Statically checks if requested level is greater than or equal to the logger level
143         * based on LevelResolver rules.
144         * <p>
145         * Rules are:
146         * <ol>
147         * <li><code>OFF</code> for either level or logger level is <code>false</code></li>
148         * <li><code>ALL</code> is converted to <code>TRACE</code> for both level and
149         * loggerLevel</li>
150         * </ol>
151         * @param level if OFF will always return false.
152         * @param loggerLevel if OFF will always return false.
153         * @return true if level is greater or equal to loggerLevel unless either is OFF.
154         * @apiNote this method is mainly used for testing purposes and is not designed with
155         * performance in mind. In facades it is better to get an integer and use that for
156         * comparison.
157         */
158        public static boolean checkEnabled(System.Logger.Level level, System.Logger.Level loggerLevel) {
159                if (level == System.Logger.Level.OFF) {
160                        return false;
161                }
162                if (loggerLevel == System.Logger.Level.OFF) {
163                        return false;
164                }
165                level = normalizeLevel(level);
166                loggerLevel = normalizeLevel(loggerLevel);
167                return level.getSeverity() >= loggerLevel.getSeverity();
168        }
169
170        /**
171         * Parses a Level from a string. ALL is converted to TRACE.
172         * @param input level like String where case is ignored and some JUL level names are
173         * supported as well.
174         * @return level
175         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the input is not recognized as a level.
176         */
177        public static Level parseLevel(String input) throws IllegalArgumentException {
178                input = input.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT);
179                return switch (input) {
180                        case "ALL" -> Level.TRACE;
181                        case "TRACE", "FINEST" -> Level.TRACE;
182                        case "DEBUG", "FINE" -> Level.DEBUG;
183                        case "INFO" -> Level.INFO;
184                        case "WARN", "WARNING" -> Level.WARNING;
185                        case "ERROR", "SEVERE" -> Level.ERROR;
186                        case "OFF" -> Level.OFF;
187                        default -> {
188                                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse Level from input. input='" + input + "'");
189                        }
190                };
191        }
192
193        /**
194         * Will convert ALL to TRACE.
195         * @param level level
196         * @return a Level.
197         */
198        public static Level normalizeLevel(Level level) {
199                return Builder.allToTrace(level);
200        }
201
202        /**
203         * Abstract level resolver builder.
204         *
205         * @param <T> builder type.
206         * @apiNote while this builder class is public it is effectively package protected per
207         * the constructor on purpose. It is public to allow Javadoc to propagate correctly.
208         */
209        abstract class AbstractBuilder<T> {
210
211                /**
212                 * level configs.
213                 */
214                protected List<LevelConfig> levelConfigs = new ArrayList<>();
215
216                /**
217                 * levels
218                 */
219                protected Map<String, Level> levels = new LinkedHashMap<>();
220
221                /**
222                 * Do nothing constructor.
223                 */
224                AbstractBuilder() {
225                }
226
227                /**
228                 * Sets a logger to a level.
229                 * @param level level.
230                 * @param loggerName logger name.
231                 * @return this builder.
232                 */
233                public T level(Level level, String loggerName) {
234                        levels.put(loggerName, level);
235                        return self();
236                }
237
238                /**
239                 * Sets a level for all loggers.
240                 * @param level level.
241                 * @return this builder.
242                 */
243                public T level(Level level) {
244                        levels.put("", level);
245                        return self();
246                }
247
248                /**
249                 * Adds a level config.
250                 * @param resolver level config.
251                 * @return this builder.
252                 */
253                public T config(LevelConfig resolver) {
254                        levelConfigs.add(resolver);
255                        return self();
256                }
257
258                /**
259                 * Adds a level config based on properties and will use the prefix as the root.
260                 * @param properties properties containing levels with prefix.
261                 * @param prefix for example <code>logging.level</code>
262                 * @return this.
263                 */
264                public T config(LogProperties properties, String prefix) {
265                        return config(ConfigLevelResolver.of(properties, prefix));
266                }
267
268                /**
269                 * Builds the level config based on {@link #levelConfigs} and {@link #levels}.
270                 * @return level config or <code>null</code>.
271                 */
272                protected @Nullable LevelConfig buildLevelConfigOrNull() {
273                        var copyLevels = new LinkedHashMap<>(levels);
274                        var copyResolvers = new ArrayList<>(levelConfigs);
275                        if (copyLevels.isEmpty() && copyResolvers.isEmpty()) {
276                                return null;
277                        }
278                        if (!copyLevels.isEmpty()) {
279                                copyResolvers.add(0, Builder.ofStaticMap(copyLevels));
280                        }
281                        var combined = LevelConfig.of(copyResolvers);
282                        return combined;
283                }
284
285                /**
286                 * This.
287                 * @return this.
288                 */
289                protected abstract T self();
290
291        }
292
293        /**
294         * Level resolver builder. {@link LevelConfig} that are added have higher precedence.
295         */
296        public final class Builder extends AbstractBuilder<Builder> {
297
298                /**
299                 * level resolvers.
300                 */
301                private final List<LevelResolver> levelResolvers = new ArrayList<>();
302
303                private Builder() {
304                }
305
306                /**
307                 * Builds a cached level resolver.
308                 * @return level resolver.
309                 */
310                public LevelResolver build() {
311                        var config = buildLevelConfigOrNull();
312                        List<LevelResolver> copy = new ArrayList<>();
313                        if (config != null) {
314                                copy.add(config);
315                        }
316                        copy.addAll(levelResolvers);
317                        return cached(ofResolvers(copy));
318                }
319
320                /**
321                 * Adds a level resolver to the end of the resolve list.
322                 * @param resolver level resolver.
323                 * @return this
324                 */
325                public Builder resolver(LevelResolver resolver) {
326                        this.levelResolvers.add(resolver);
327                        return this;
328                }
329
330                /**
331                 * This.
332                 * @return this.
333                 */
334                @Override
335                protected Builder self() {
336                        return this;
337                }
338
339                static LevelResolver ofResolvers(Collection<? extends LevelResolver> resolvers) {
340                        if (resolvers.isEmpty()) {
341                                return StaticLevelResolver.ALL;
342                        }
343                        else if (resolvers.size() == 1) {
344                                return Objects.requireNonNull(resolvers.iterator().next());
345                        }
346                        return CompositeLevelResolver.of(resolvers);
347                }
348
349                static LevelConfig ofStaticMap(Map<String, Level> levels) {
350                        if (levels.isEmpty()) {
351                                return StaticLevelResolver.ALL;
352                        }
353                        else if (levels.size() == 1) {
354                                var e = levels.entrySet().iterator().next();
355                                if (e.getKey().equals("")) {
356                                        return StaticLevelResolver.of(e.getValue());
357                                }
358                                return new SingleLevelResolver(e.getKey(), allToTrace(e.getValue()));
359                        }
360                        Map<String, Level> copy = new HashMap<>();
361
362                        for (var et : levels.entrySet()) {
363                                copy.put(et.getKey(), allToTrace(et.getValue()));
364                        }
365                        return new MapLevelResolver(copy);
366                }
367
368                static Level allToTrace(Level level) {
369                        if (level == Level.ALL) {
370                                return Level.TRACE;
371                        }
372                        return level;
373                }
374
375                static LevelResolver cached(LevelResolver resolver) {
376                        if (resolver instanceof StaticLevelResolver) {
377                                return resolver;
378                        }
379                        return new CachedLevelResolver(resolver);
380                }
381
382        }
383
384}
385
386enum StaticLevelResolver implements LevelConfig {
387
388        ALL(Level.ALL), //
389        TRACE(Level.TRACE), INFO(Level.INFO), //
390        DEBUG(Level.DEBUG), //
391        ERROR(Level.ERROR), //
392        WARNING(Level.WARNING), //
393        OFF(Level.OFF),; //
394
395        private final Level level;
396
397        private StaticLevelResolver(Level level) {
398                this.level = level;
399        }
400
401        static LevelConfig of(Level level) {
402                return switch (level) {
403                        case INFO -> StaticLevelResolver.INFO;
404                        case ALL -> StaticLevelResolver.TRACE; // This is on purpose
405                        case DEBUG -> StaticLevelResolver.DEBUG;
406                        case ERROR -> StaticLevelResolver.ERROR;
407                        case OFF -> StaticLevelResolver.OFF;
408                        case TRACE -> StaticLevelResolver.TRACE;
409                        case WARNING -> StaticLevelResolver.WARNING;
410                };
411        }
412
413        @Override
414        public @Nullable Level levelOrNull(String name) {
415                if ("".equals(name)) {
416                        return this.level;
417                }
418                return null;
419        }
420
421        @Override
422        public Level resolveLevel(String name) {
423                return this.level;
424        }
425
426}
427
428record SingleLevelResolver(String name, Level level) implements LevelConfig {
429
430        @Override
431        public @Nullable Level levelOrNull(String name) {
432                if (this.name.equals(name)) {
433                        return this.level;
434                }
435                return null;
436        }
437
438}
439
440record MapLevelResolver(Map<String, Level> levels) implements LevelConfig {
441        @Override
442        public @Nullable Level levelOrNull(String name) {
443                return levels.get(name);
444        }
445}
446
447record CompositeLevelConfig(LevelConfig[] levelConfigs) implements LevelConfig {
448
449        @Override
450        public @Nullable Level levelOrNull(String name) {
451                for (var c : levelConfigs) {
452                        var level = c.levelOrNull(name);
453                        if (level != null) {
454                                return level;
455                        }
456                }
457                return null;
458        }
459
460        @Override
461        public String toString() {
462                return this.getClass().getSimpleName() + Arrays.asList(levelConfigs);
463        }
464
465}
466
467record CompositeLevelResolver(LevelResolver[] resolvers, Level defaultLevel) implements LevelResolver {
468
469        public static LevelResolver of(Collection<? extends LevelResolver> resolvers) {
470                List<LevelResolver> resolved = new ArrayList<>();
471
472                for (var r : resolvers) {
473                        if (r instanceof CompositeLevelResolver cr) {
474                                for (var j : cr.resolvers()) {
475                                        resolved.add(j);
476                                }
477                        }
478                        else {
479                                resolved.add(r);
480                        }
481                }
482                @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
483                LevelResolver @NonNull [] array = resolved.toArray(new LevelResolver[] {});
484                return new CompositeLevelResolver(array, Level.OFF);
485        }
486
487        @Override
488        public String toString() {
489                return this.getClass().getSimpleName() + Arrays.asList(resolvers);
490        }
491
492        @Override
493        public Level resolveLevel(String name) {
494                Level current = Level.ALL;
495                for (var resolver : resolvers) {
496                        var level = resolver.resolveLevel(name);
497                        if (level == Level.TRACE) {
498                                return level;
499                        }
500                        if (current == Level.ALL) {
501                                current = level;
502                                continue;
503                        }
504                        if (current.getSeverity() > level.getSeverity()) {
505                                current = level;
506                        }
507                }
508                if (current == Level.ALL) {
509                        current = defaultLevel;
510                }
511                return current;
512        }
513
514        @Override
515        public void clear() {
516                for (var resolver : resolvers) {
517                        resolver.clear();
518                }
519        }
520
521}
522
523/*
524 * Revisit perf. ConcurrentHashMap based on benchmarks is incredibly slow for most cases
525 * and looping can be faster.
526 *
527 * Luckily level resolution is only called when a logger is created and the loggers are
528 * cached.
529 */
530final class CachedLevelResolver implements LevelResolver {
531
532        private final LevelResolver levelResolver;
533
534        private final ConcurrentHashMap<String, Level> levelCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
535
536        public CachedLevelResolver(LevelResolver levelResolver) {
537                super();
538                this.levelResolver = levelResolver;
539        }
540
541        @Override
542        public Level resolveLevel(String name) {
543                return levelCache.computeIfAbsent(name, n -> levelResolver.resolveLevel(n));
544        }
545
546        @Override
547        public String toString() {
548                return this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "[" + levelResolver + "]";
549        }
550
551        @Override
552        public void clear() {
553                levelCache.clear();
554                levelResolver.clear();
555        }
556
557}
558
559final class ConfigLevelResolver implements LevelConfig {
560
561        private final LogProperties properties;
562
563        private final String prefix;
564
565        private final PropertyGetter<Level> levelExtractor;
566
567        public static ConfigLevelResolver of(LogProperties properties) {
568                return of(properties, LogProperties.LEVEL_PREFIX);
569        }
570
571        public static ConfigLevelResolver of(LogProperties properties, String prefix) {
572                var levelExtractor = PropertyGetter.of()
573                        .withPrefix(prefix)
574                        .map(s -> s.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT))
575                        .map(LevelResolver::parseLevel);
576                return new ConfigLevelResolver(properties, prefix, levelExtractor);
577        }
578
579        private ConfigLevelResolver(LogProperties properties, String prefix, PropertyGetter<Level> levelExtractor) {
580                super();
581                this.properties = properties;
582                this.prefix = prefix;
583                this.levelExtractor = levelExtractor;
584        }
585
586        @Override
587        public @Nullable Level levelOrNull(String name) {
588                return levelExtractor.build(name).get(properties).valueOrNull();
589        }
590
591        @Override
592        public String toString() {
593                return "ConfigLevelResolver[prefix=" + prefix + ", properties=" + properties + "]";
594        }
595
596}
